title: help me please ???
content:
I desire to get into magazine lay out & design. Where should I go? Where should I start?  
Any help or assistance will be greatly appreciated. Thank You very very much.  
Hersheykat~

author: hersheykat

comments.content: This would be better posted in General Discussions. I don’t think too many people see the blogs.
So I’m trying to figure out what the picture is for. Is this the type of content you want to work with in magazine design? Is this you?
